reviews.title: Fast and great for travel
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really like this charger and I find it very efficient. It's pretty small, charges my phone fast, and is great for travel. Just a heads up—it's not strong enough for big laptops. But overall, super handy and works great!

reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really enjoyed this product and foresee myself consistently using it in the future. The only reason why this product didn't get 5 stars was because I found the size to be a bit bulky. But other than that I have no complaints!

reviews.title: A perfect blend of portability, power, and eco-fri
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The compact design of the Belkin BoostCharge 45W USB-C Wall Charger allows me to carry it effortlessly in my handbag, making it especially convenient during travels. I've noticed that many hotel rooms only provide USB ports for charging, which often aren't sufficient for my devices. Previously, I had to carry both a cable and a bulky adapter, which was inconvenient and took up unnecessary space. This Belkin charger has resolved that issue; it's powerful enough to charge my devices quickly and compact enough to carry anywhere. The foldable prongs are a thoughtful feature, preventing any damage to my bags and making it incredibly travel-friendly. Overall, the Belkin BoostCharge Compact USB-C Wall Charger 45W has exceeded my expectations, combining efficiency with portability.

reviews.title: Fast compact charger perfect for somebody on the g
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Fast charger and very compact. charges my phone really fast only takes a couple minutes love that the prongs fold so it’s easier to carry with me in my pocket and the usb c is really Helpful now that almost everything is usb c

reviews.title: Belkin BoostCharge Compact USB-C Wall Charger 45W
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This charger is exactly what I was looking for. It’s built well, small, lightweight, and powerful. It charges my phone and tablet a lot faster than the cheaper chargers I’ve used in the past. It works, and it works well. It doesn’t come with a cable, but that’s pretty normal these days. Overall, if you want a compact, reliable fast charger, this one’s a winner. Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Quality product, perhaps somewhat limited utility
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Simple but effective charger. Personally, I am not the biggest fan of having a USB-C outlet because my phone requires a USB-C cable (so I would need a double USB-C cable if I wanted to use it). However, I do have to say that the size is quite convenient and it feels similar in quality to other Belkin products, which is to say that it feels like it can withstand many years of use. In personal experience, the cable tends to be the part to deteriorate first and it should be important to note that this product does not come with any sort of cable or adapter.

reviews.title: Reliable Power in a Small Package
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I’ve been using Belkin products for years and they’ve consistently delivered quality and reliability—this 45W Boost Charge Compact Charger is no exception. It’s sleek, compact, and perfect for travel or everyday use. Despite its small size, it packs enough power to charge both my Mac and Windows laptops with no issues. It doesn’t overheat, charges fast, and the build feels solid—just what I expect from Belkin. I also appreciate the USB-C Power Delivery support, which ensures efficient charging for a range of devices. If you’re looking for a no-fuss, dependable charger from a brand that won’t let you down, this is a great pick.

reviews.title: Decent Product
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] So first thing, it’s literally just the box part. It doesn’t come with the actual charging cord, that should be included on the box and the description on whatever site. I just happened to have a charger cord from my current fast charging set up. It works really well! As soon as it’s plugged in it comes across your phone as “charging SUPER FAST”

reviews.title: Great fast, compact charger
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This has been a great compact and fast charger for use with my Galaxy S25 smartphone! I LOVE how it folds up to be compact and easy to take with me. It charges my phone and other devices really fast without overheating. I am really happy with this charger and would recommend to others.

reviews.title: Quick & Sleek
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This has to be one of the nicest charging cubes! It is so compact, fast, and sleek-looking! I love how the prongs tuck back so cleanly. It does not get hot like my older blocks—if you’re in the market, this is a great option!

reviews.title: The Belkin BoostCharge 45W USB-C charger is a fast
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Belkin BoostCharge Compact USB-C Wall Charger 45W is hands-down the best charger I’ve ever used—compact, powerful, and incredibly reliable. It delivers lightning-fast charging, taking my phone from 0 to 50% in just 28 minutes, and works perfectly with everything from phones and tablets to USB-C laptops. Its intelligent PD and PPS support ensures safe, efficient charging without overheating, and the eco-friendly design made with recycled plastic is a thoughtful bonus. Whether you’re at home, in the office, or on the go, this little powerhouse is a total game-changer and a must-have in your tech arsenal.

reviews.title: Belkin Compact USB-C fast wall charger
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This Belkin charger is a win for anyone looking for speed and style! It’s super compact with a fun, modern design—perfect for travel or keeping things clutter-free. Charges efficiently and does exactly what you'd expect from a fast charger. The only downside? It doesn't come with a cable, so you’ll need to have your own USB-C cord on hand. Still, a great product overall!

reviews.title: Very strong charging speed

reviews.title: Highly recommend to anyone who’s tired of stepping
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I’m absolutely thrilled with the Auto Drive Universal Basic Accordion Sunshade! Effectiveness: It keeps my car so much cooler, even on the hottest days. I can literally feel the temperature difference the moment I open the door — no more burning seats or steering wheels! Versatility: It fits perfectly in both my SUV and my sedan, thanks to its smart, universal design. Super easy to adjust if needed! Durability: The material feels tough and built to last. I’ve been using it daily, folding and unfolding, and it still looks brand new — no tears, no creases. Design: Sleek and practical! I love the accordion fold — it’s quick to open and just as easy to collapse and store. Plus, it doesn’t take up much space when not in use. Installation: Couldn’t be easier — just open it and pop it behind the windshield. Takes literally two seconds, and it stays in place perfectly.

reviews.title: A daily essential must have
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Belkin compact wall charger is a must for travel and daily work/school use. Not only is it super compact but it’s very durable and does not feel cheap. I love how fast it can charge my iPhone because it only takes about 2 hours to fully charge my old phone from 0%, that’s a record for me. Overall a must have daily essential!

reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I enjoy the charging adapter's quick charging, dependable operation, and affordability. I say it's worth the money, it charges us phones really quickly, and it works great. I'm value the style and size as well.

reviews.title: Portable and charges efficiently!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Works great! Super portable and was compatible with my MacBook and with my portable charger! It feels like a nice quality charger that will last me a long time. Charges efficiently but does get a little warm after using it for a while.

reviews.title: USB-C Compact Charger
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The universe must have known, because as soon as I received this compact usb-c charger, my phone broke and my new phone uses a usb-c cable. And the phone only comes with the charging cable, not the outlet cube, so this was literally perfect timing as I have no other usb-c chargers. I was initially surprised at how small the charger is (see picture with hand for size reference), but it is small but mighty! I love the compact design, as I can take this charger with me anywhere. I throw it in my work bag, bring it in my car and have even used it in the small space between the outlet and our sofa. I love that the portion that plugs into the wall can be folded up back into the charger, helping its compact size. My usb-c charging cable works perfectly with this, and my phone charges very fast. I've really found great use and have been loving this compact usb-c charger! Overall I definitely recommend, especially if you're on the go and need a charger that you can bring with you anywhere!

reviews.title: Fast small incredible!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Belkin 30W Compact Charger is a reliable and efficient charging solution for various devices. Its sleek, compact design makes it highly portable, perfect for travel or daily use. The charger delivers fast charging capabilities for smartphones, tablets, and other USB-C devices, ensuring quick power-ups without sacrificing space. With built-in safeguards, it protects against overheating and overcharging, providing peace of mind during use. While it lacks multiple ports, its simplicity and effectiveness make it a solid choice for anyone seeking a dependable charger. Overall, the Belkin 30W Compact Charger combines performance and convenience, making it a valuable addition to your tech accessories.

reviews.title: Fast charging
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received the Belkin Boostcharge cube charger complimentary to sample. Easy to plug into my wall and connect to my laptop, this charger helped to charge my laptop very quickly and safely. Definitely recommend.

reviews.title: Really does charge your phone faster-game changer!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I'm not gonna lie, I was a little doubtful this would actually charge any faster than my normal charger but I was pleasantly surprised. I use my phone a lot for work and it's constantly dying. I wanted to actually put it to the test so I plugged my phone into my normal charger for 10 minutes then this for 10 minutes. This charged my phone 2x quicker than my normal charger. I also love that it's the same size as a normal charger so it's easy to travel with. Would definitely recommend if you're looking to get a speedy charge!

reviews.title: Fast
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received this product for free in exaggerated for my honest review. I like the sleek design of this cube charger. I was able to quickly charge my iPhone with no problems at all. I also like how you can close the prongs that way they take less space and won't break when traveling.

reviews.title: Very fast charger, small and mighty
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have been very happy with my Belkin Boostcharge! The wall charge is extremely fast giving me more than half a charge in a little as 30 min. I no longer leave my phone plugged into the charger over night because of how fast I can charge it through out the day now. The cubic charger block is tiny and fits well into outlets and doesn't block the next outlet port. I love the fact I can flip in the prongs of the charger for easy storage into my small purses or small drawers. Overall, I am very happy with the charger! I would recommend it to anyone looking for a charging block for a USB-C cord.

reviews.title: Fast
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I like this little wall charger. It's so tiny but it charges my phone really fast. This is great for traveling or just having on hand just in case. You can fit in in your purse, pocket, leave it in your car etc. I like how the little prong things fold in too.

reviews.title: Very fast charger
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have these about a month and I'm pleased with my purchase. They charge fast and they're both USB-C. I look for name-brand chargers so that was a deciding factor for me. Yes, they're more expensive but many of the cheaper chargers (& cables) fail prematurely or the cables get short circuited prematurely..

reviews.title: 4.5 out of 5
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Belkin Boostcharge Cubic 20W USB-C Wall Charger is a compact and efficient solution for fast charging needs. Its 20W power delivery charges devices quickly, significantly reducing downtime. The cubic design is both stylish and space-saving, fitting easily into any outlet without obstructing adjacent plugs. I appreciate the durable build quality, which feels robust and long-lasting. It's perfect for travel due to its lightweight nature. While it lacks multiple ports, its fast-charging capability makes it a worthwhile investment for single-device charging. Highly recommended for those needing a reliable and quick charger.

reviews.title: Great low profile rapid charger
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This charger is great works, it's a 20w so you get the fast charging benefit which is a must these days. It's small and compact so easily fits in a bag for travel compared to some other brands that are big and bulky. It worked to rapid charge my phone and also works to rapid charge the watch as well.

reviews.title: So useful!

This one works well. I also like the new look it has. Thank you influenster !

reviews.title: Perfect choice
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Belkin USB-C 30W charger has a modest size, flexible design and is extremely compact. The charging port is also designed to be foldable, saving space and becoming a convenient charger, suitable for all spaces, in all situations and even when you have to move constantly. The charger can quickly charge 0-50% for iPhone in just the first 20 - 25 minutes.

I have thrown it into my bag a couple days in a row ,and I haven't had to worry about being careful. I had hoped it would be a fast charger, but it seems to charge at normal speed. It's compatible with my devices. When looking at the specs, I also noticed that it runs efficiently, which is nice when I leave it plugged in the outlet.

reviews.title: Sleek design
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Love the design it's so sleek and modern. It charged up my phone really fast so would definitely recommend. It has a nice weight to it and seems durable. It's also small and compact and very portable

reviews.title: Small and fast charging
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received the Belkin 30w Compact Charger. The design is very clean and sleek. I like that it doesn't look bulky when plugged in and can blend well in any outlet of any room. I was pleasantly surprised with how fast this small charger charged my phone. It is easy to travel with, and since the prongs are foldable, it makes it easy to store anywhere from a purse to even a pants pocket. This is extremely useful when there is very little time to charge a device or if there is limited space. For the price, this is a great buy!

reviews.title: Efficient charging compact design
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This charger is nice because it is around the same size as the ones that come with iPhone except the prongs are foldable so it becomes even more compact. The cube feels well built and durable. The charging speed is quick.

reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Perfect compact charger to keep in your purse, areas with limited space or for travel. This cube is small and the prongs close into it which makes it easy to store. It charged my phone quickly and no need to search for a USB-A to USB-C chord to use with other chargers I have.

reviews.title: Wow super fast charging
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Received this product in the mail yesterday and had a few devices I could use to charge. The speed on this is lightning fast and the plug itself if modern and streamlined in design. Totally worth the price.

reviews.title: Very fast charger
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Belkin BoostCharge Compact 30W USB-C Wall Charger is a great solution for fast and reliable charging of devices. The first thing you notice is the compact design. The charger fits easily into your pocket or bag, making it ideal for use on the go. As for performance, 30W of power is enough to quickly charge smartphones, tablets, and even some laptops. I tested it with several devices, and charging was significantly faster compared to regular adapters. Particularly pleasing is the support for Power Delivery, which ensures optimal charging for compatible devices. The build quality is top-notch, which is typical for Belkin products. The USB-C cable connects firmly, and the charger itself does not heat up even with prolonged use. This gives confidence in its durability and safety.

reviews.title: Efficient pocket sized charger
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I got the Belkin BoostCharge 30W USB-C charger in my Influenster package, and I've found it to be brilliant. Its compact size makes it easy to carry around, especially when traveling. ### Ratings: - **Charging Speed**: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5) Charges iPhone up to 50% in under half an hour, works equally well with my iPads, and can even handle a MacBook Air. - **Portability**: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5) Super compact design with foldable prongs makes it easy to carry while traveling. - **Compatibility**: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5) Tested with Apple, Sony, and Google devices. Works on all of them without issues. - **Build Quality**: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5) Solid construction with a very nice looking design, built to last and perfect for everyday use. - **Value for Money**: ⭐⭐⭐⭐ (4/5) It's a bit on the pricier side for some, but you get top-tier quality and reliability. - **Heat Management**: ⭐⭐⭐⭐ (4/5) Stays cool most of the time, although occasional slight warmth during prolonged use. Overall, it's a reliable and practical choice if you're looking for a fast and efficient pocket-sized charger.

It is literally the size of the item on the box. This is great for travel. It fits in the pocket of my luggage and/or backpack and does not take up any space. And it is just super cute to look at. I don't know how many times I have been waiting for a flight when someone forgets their charger, you can offer them to use this. And this is half the size and then some of my Mac Air charger and does work on my Mac Air no problem, so this will go with me on travels and the MAC charger will stay home to just save space.

reviews.title: Charges about as fast as the rest
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] So. The charger here is actually a very nice, compact size, and the prongs fold back into the plug to make a teeny cube. The downside is that you will need to own or buy a USB-C to USB-C cable in order for it to work. I did exactly that, and I can't say my or my husband's (brand new) phones charged noticeably faster than any of the other, standard "fast" chargers out there or in here. The nice thing is that it's very portable, and will be stationed in our kitchen, the only room without a permanent charger as of now.

reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] If you don't have this charger you have to go get it asap,I really really recommend it it charges your phone 2 ot 3 times the speed,and no I'm not joking I really really recommend it

reviews.title: PORTABLE TO THE MAX
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Charges so fast!! The size is also so convenient. Love that I can carry it around in my purse or pocket. Its very sturdy, and its compatible with type c chargers!

reviews.title: Fast charging chunk
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Fast charging compact very portable charger chunk durable works great with my iPhone 14 max it's C charger never have enough of them. Will you buy more?

reviews.title: Died after a week
reviews.review_text: Just bought for iphone, it died after a week, waste of money.
